isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT, CONNECTING RODS AND PISTONS - Connecting Rods, Pistons and Piston Rings - Check Piston Protrusion

step1.para: Turn the crankshaft so the piston is at the highest point of its stroke.
Zero a surface gauge on the crankcase deck surface.

Position the tip of the surface gauge onto the piston head at the 3 o'clock or 9 o'clock position (Positioning the dial indicator tip at 12 o'clock or 6 o'clock will not yield an accurate measurement). Record the reading.
If the measurement is not within the specification, check for bent or twisted connecting rods, damaged piston pin bushings, and damaged or improperly installed connecting rod bearings and caps.
